ingredients.item: 350g tub essential Waitrose Tomato And Basil Sauce

instructions.step: Cook the sausages under a preheated grill for 15 minutes, turning occasionally until cooked throughout, then slice.
Meanwhile, cook the gnocchi in boiling water for 3 minutes, then drain. Add the sauce and petit pois to the pan and cook for 1 minute. Stir in the sausages and gnocchi and heat through for a minute.
Serve sprinkled with the sliced salad onions.
